node.title: More history made by best-in-the-world Ash Barty
node.alt: An emotional Ash Barty hunkers down on court as she reacts to the final point of her Wimbledon final win.
node.description: Ash Barty's name now sits alongside Steffi Graf, Serena Williams, Martina Navratilova and Chris Evert as the only women to be world number at the end of three consecutive years.
node.content:
["Ash Barty has joined some of the greatest names in tennis history by becoming just the fifth woman player ever to be crowned world number one at the end of three consecutive years.", "Australia's Wimbledon champion has not competed for more than two months but such has been the excellence of her globetrotting, five-trophy 2021 campaign that no-one has come to catching her as the world's best player this year.", "The Women's Tennis Association (WTA) officially confirmed the Queenslander had earned the prized accolade of the year-ending number one ranking.", "It was an honour some critics felt she had not merited this time last year as the rankings were frozen for more than four months and Barty sat out the 2020 season in Australia because of the COVID-19 pandemic.", "This year, though, she has ensured there could be no possible doubt about her supremacy as she has\u00a0lifted a nap hand of titles during a dazzling world tour, topped by the second grand slam triumph of her career at Wimbledon.", "", "
Barty won five titles in 2021, including her second grand slam at Wimbledon.(AP: John Minchillo)
", "Now, as she celebrates 95 consecutive weeks at the top of the game, she joins a quartet of all-time greats \u2014\u00a0Steffi Graf, Martina Navratilova, Serena Williams and Chris Evert \u2014\u00a0as the only players to finish year-end number one for three straight years.", "Barty who started the year by winning the Yarra Valley Classic in Melbourne, went on to successfully defend her Miami title before going to Europe to take the Stuttgart Grand Prix on her 25th birthday weekend \u2014\u00a0complete with a new Porsche as a prize.", "Though injury cost her the chance to successfully defend her French Open title, she then lifted her dream title at Wimbledon, won a mixed doubles bronze at the Olympics and the Cincinnati Open in the US.", "", "
Barty has not played since the US Open and is preparing for next year's Australian Open.(AP: Aaron Doster)
", "Her shock exit to Shelby Rogers at the US Open was her last match of the season as she opted out of the WTA Finals in Guadalajara, Mexico \u2014\u00a0a title which was annexed on Wednesday by Garbine Muguruza \u2014\u00a0and went home for some rest while also preparing for her assault on the Australian Open title.", "Having also posted a runner-up finish at the Madrid Open, Barty ends the year with a remarkable 42-8 record in 2021 and has now enjoyed 102 weeks as number one\u00a0in total.", "AAP"]
